summary.description: Identifying microbes from environment water samples in a discovery-based learning module. Teaching Microbial Identification with Matrix-Assisted Laser Desorption/Ionization Time-of-Flight Mass Spectrometry (MALDI-TOF MS) and Bioinformatics Tools † . Ever since the first observation of “animalcules” under a microscope, and the subsequent discovery of microorganisms of myriad size, shape, pigmentation and motility modes, classification in aid of microbial identification is key to understanding inter-relationships between diverse microbes.
